import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import OneArticle from './OneArticle' import axios from 'axios' function ListArticles() { const [articles,setArticles] = useState ([]) const getAllArticles = () => { axios.get("http://localhost:4000/articles") .then(response => setArticles(response.data)) .catch(err => console.error(err)) } useEffect(() => { getAllArticles() }, []) return (
List of articles
Add article
) } export default ListArticles
